Room.Name: The Timid Camel Fine Imports Shop
Room.ShortDescription: The Timid Camel is the name of a caravan from the Kia'tra Desert.
Room.LongDescription: Since not many people like to travel through the desert, goods from the other side of the world seldom ever reach Oceancrest, and even moreso the other way around. Various interesting daggers and swords from a completely different society are for sale here, but at a very expensive price.
